lore: Deployed far behind the front line, Earthshaker Carriages can maintain a relentless rate of fire, limited only by the ready supply of munitions Such barrages have been known to break enemy positions almost unaided; heavy shelling reduces strongholds to rubble and churns contested ground into cratered wastes.

core: Earthshaker Rounds: In your Shooting phase
if one or more of those attacks made with its earthshaker cannon scored a hit against an INFANTRY unit
until the end of your opponentâ€™s next turn
that INFANTRY unit is shaken. While a unit is shaken
subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.
